channel.title: No drops when you die. Help appreciated
channel.description:
No one loses their items or drops them when they die, now they keep everything.
Does anyone know how to make people lose their items? Preferably correctly because I wish to keep the protect item active.

item.title: No drops when you die. Help appreciated

item.description:

Got it working, thanks.

item.title: No drops when you die. Help appreciated
item.dc:creator: @pk_george1 pk george1
item.description:
@pk_george1 wrote:

You need to go to the client.java and go to the deathstage part , in the deathstage part this controls everytime a player dies inlcuding drops. All you need to do is edit it to where you want the player to go after death and iff they drop ro do not drop its etc.

Read full topic
